body.name: Steam and Go Steam Mop Floor Steamer with Handheld Steam Cleaner for Tile and Grout, Hardwood Floors, Laminate, Glass, Fabric, Upholstery, Garments, Metal, Carpet, Granite and Countertops

features: VERSATILE 10-IN-1 STEAMER - Steam & Go’s The Housekeeper isn’t just any steam mop; it’s a premium 10-in-1 steamer cleaning solution. Whether it's hardwood, laminate, carpet, fabric, or upholstery, this powerful machine ensures your home is fresh and impeccably clean.

INNOVATIVE DESIGN & FUNCTIONALITY - Not just for floors! This machine easily transforms to handle tile, grout, curtains, and couches. With a detachable base and 360º steam tool attachments, maneuvering around home surfaces becomes a breeze, ensuring a deep and thorough clean.

DUAL TANK & ENHANCED PRESSURE - Experience hassle-free cleaning! Our steam mop features a two-tank system, with one dedicated to water and the other designed for your detergent. Its boiling water setting amplifies pressure, removing the toughest dirt and grime from surfaces.

EXTENDED REACH & CONVENIENCE - Designed with user experience in mind, our handheld steamer cleaner boasts a generous 20-foot-long power cord. This ensures easy navigation across large rooms and hard-to-reach spaces. Cleaning every inch of your home is now effortlessly achievable.

SAFETY & PRODUCT SPECS - Prioritizing your family's health, our steamer is child and pet-safe, using only water to cleanse. The machine operates at a max temperature of 356°F (180°C) with a voltage of 120v-60Hz and durable ABS plastic construction.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Convenient Cleaning in a Single Go Make floor cleaning and steaming effortless with Steam & Go's The Housekeeper Steam Mop Floor Steamer. Our versatile steam machine comes equipped with all the essential accessories you need to keep your home fresh and squeaky clean. Say hello to a sparkling clean home with Steam & Go!

The Housekeeper Experience cleaning perfection with the Housekeeper, your ultimate solution for all types of floors. Our versatile steamer mop raises the bar, providing you with a complete set of cleaning tools to conquer every surface in your home. Your companion for a clean and fresh living space is here.

Effective Floor Cleaner Provides superior steam cleaning, making your house cleaner and fresher. Discover the power of our Steam Mop Floor Steamer, an exceptional floor cleaning solution that goes above and beyond. With its superior steam cleaning capabilities, our floor steamer offers a spotless and revitalized living space. Elevate your cleaning routine and embrace the transformative benefits of our steam mop floor steamer today! Easy cleaning on tile and grout The Multi-Purpose Mop is also easy to use on cleaning tile and grout. With its versatile design, this innovative mop effortlessly tackles a variety of cleaning tasks, including tile and grout. Experience the ease and convenience of achieving sparkling clean home with minimal effort. Say goodbye to tedious scrubbing and hello to a more efficient and effective cleaning experience. Discover the power of our Steam Mop Floor Steamer and take your cleaning routine to new heights of cleanliness. Professional steam cleaning on your home Make cleaning so much easier with our functional steam mop. Experience the ultimate cleaning convenience with our Steam Mop Floor Steamer. This multipurpose steam machine is equipped with all the necessary accessories to keep your home fresh and squeaky clean. Designed to be safe on all surfaces, including fabric, garments, carpet, upholstery, hardwood floors, tiles and grout, countertops, carpet and more, it provides unparalleled versatility. Simplify your cleaning tasks and elevate your home's cleanliness with our Steam Mop Floor Steamer.

Introducing our cleaning steamer, a safe and effective solution without the use of harmful chemicals. With only water, create a pristine environment for your kids and pets. Enjoy peace of mind in every clean.

Why Choose Us? No Harsh Chemicals Needed Experience the peace of mind that comes from cleaning your home by using our our chemical-free steamer. Only requires water to clean. Runs for 30 Minutes With an impressive steam duration of up to 30 minutes per refill, you can effortlessly tackle your cleaning tasks without interruptions. Heats Quickly Experience lightning-fast heat-up time with our steamer! In just few seconds, you'll be ready to start steaming. Easy to Store Its compact design and user-friendly features make it a breeze to store when not in use

Steam Cleaner with Unique Design Squeegee nozzle With its precision blade, this is perfect for absorbing liquids on floors, directing mop water towards drains, and achieving spotless home.. Machine washable mop pads These machine washable mop pads are super absorbent. Designed for the Steam & Go Mop, these mop pads are washable and can easily be re-used. Scraping tools Your ultimate cleaning companion comes with a range of scraping tools. This is the time to tackle tough cleaning challenges with ease. Triangle detergent spray head Its unique design allows for precise and efficient application of detergent in hard-to-reach corners and edges.

Your Cleaning Partners Steam Cleaner Lavender Bundle Multi-surface Cleaner Scrubbing Mop Pads Description Experience the ultimate cleaning duo that leaves surfaces fresh and immaculate. Description Experience the power of our scented cleaners and elevate your cleaning routine. Description These pads effortlessly tackle tough messes and spills. Reusable and washable. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight & easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: The floor in my apartment is vinyl with grooves in it which makes it very hard to clean. This steamer works perfectly and best of all it can be hand held. It has a number of attachments, an extra cleaning pad and a longer cord. I like the triangular head for getting into corners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our deep cleaning needs
reviews.reviewText: Love this little steamer for keeping our bathroom floors, toilets and sinks clean and disinfected. When using the steamer for the floors, the attached pad helps the mop move and glide nicely over the bathroom floor. I've even used this on our hardwood floor to remove dirt and dog paw prints. Does an amazing job!!Easy to take apart and use as a handheld steamer for cleaning and disinfecting toilets, sinks, showers, pretty much anything you need to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 4 and half stars
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This product is awesome and high temp stream. One of the highest i have seen here. I use to use clorox bleach to clear these floors and I had to use a lot to get then clean. That cause breathing issues, but this steamer !! Oh my goodness. It Cleans! I gave it 4 and half because the brush on one clean kinda... wore out. I didn't use pressure so that was odd. I also wish the mop was Interchangeable with their other wider mop style.I will eventually get it. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cleaner is light so I don’t have to lug around a mop and bucket. The best part is that it gets my tile amazingly clean. My ceramic tile has a bit of a texture and over the years just could not get it like new. It looks like it did 20 years ago. I am so impressed! Also, love the fact that it disinfects with the steam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars So many little things add up!
reviews.reviewText: My entire house is wood floors so I purchased thinking it would make cleaning a breeze. Well, there's a couple of things wrong with the how it operates. 1, there is no on or off switch. You have to unplug it/out each time. That in itself sucks because if you're cleaning floors in one room and the outlet you plugged into is on the other side of the room, you're screwed, you have to walk across clean steamed floors to unplug it. 2, The push spray button doesn't work after 4 uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Love the steam mop it is my second one . And I have no complaints. The cord is long and it heats up quickly and the steam last a very long time. The attachment s are great. I burned out my first one pretty quickly I did not use Bottled water. Well Now I am using bottled water So this one should last me a long time . Just buy it you will not regret it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Needs more steam holes. Different pads
reviews.reviewText: 5 steam holes it not enough.It was made well. The handle and head come of easily.But it's only 5 steam holes in a line. So only around that line gets clean. And the pads that comes with it, does not clean well at all. I loved the idea of cleaner in head. With foot pump.They should make it rectangle head with steam holes all over to the edges of the pad. Helps with cleaning to the edges And keep that cleaner filler head idea. That would be perfect. It seemed well made.But I clean houses and offices. And this did not work for my needs.I have a shark mop from like 14 years ago. And it's just starting to mess up. I'm looking for it's replacement before it completely dies.Always use filtered water. Or you'll continously plug it up. Cause tap water has minerals. Don't care what steam cleaner it is. Good luck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this! I use it every day. So much better than mopping. I love that comes with all kinds of attachments. Money well spent
